projects.name: Weather Animator
projects.description: Weather Animator is a weather app with several goals in mind. First was a simple weather visualizer of sorts. When displaying weather information it also plays animations that reflect the current weather of the associated location. Second, to allow users to setup notifications for specific weather conditions.
projects.shortDescription: System for users to track weather patterns, receive SMS notifications, and provide visualizations of current conditions.
accomplishments: Integrated Open Weather and Google Maps Time Zone API into Python Flask RESTful backend to provide users with local sunset and sunrise times and current weather conditions.
Achieved smooth rendering at 60fps of custom animations of different weather conditions within HTML5 Canvas element utilizing JavaScript, Pixi.js and GreenSock.

projects.name: Space Defender
projects.shortDescription: “Battleship meets Space Invaders” in an online experience where players battle to defend their place in the cosmos.
accomplishments: Minimized front-end codebase by ~25% utilizing ReactJS for modular and componentized user interface (UI).
Allowed for real-time player interaction during battle sequences by incorporating Socket.IO into Python Flask.

projects.name: Simple Todo
projects.shortDescription: Mobile system designed to help busy professionals and time-conscious individuals to better track tasks and reminders.
accomplishments: Constructed push notification to alert users of upcoming tasks utilizing Java and Android SDK, with persistence of users events achieved utilizing SQLite database.

projects.name: GAP HTML Banner
projects.shortDescription: Mobile system designed to help busy professionals and time-conscious individuals to better track tasks and reminders.
accomplishments: Constructed push notification to alert users of upcoming tasks utilizing Java and Android SDK, with persistence of users events achieved utilizing SQLite database.

experience.name: AKQA
experience.title: Web Developer
accomplishments: Built 30+ web banners utilizing JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3 to greatly improve web presence for major worldwide brands with contracts valued at over $1.5 million.
Crafted compelling image and text animations with JavaScript and GreenSock on > 80% of brand web content to improve user engagement and advertisement click through.
Saved major client $20,000 annually in new banner creation by developing dynamic banners with JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3 to source text and accompanying images directly through Google Sheets.

experience.name: Weather Underground​
experience.title: Web Developer
accomplishments: Worked on a backend system utilizing ActionScript and Autodesk Scaleform that creates custom weather forecast videos on the fly to be streamed to mobile devices and other targets.
Designed dynamic videos with animations and graphs displaying differently to reflect the location and what type of forecast specified by users.

experience.name: Organic
experience.title: Senior Web Designer
accomplishments: Created 100+ web banners and dynamic animations for 5+ brand microsites utilizing ActionScript and HTML.
Optimized banner creation time by over 66% through engineering modular general-use particle system used in 4+ projects to produce visual effects such a smoke and bubbles.
Worked with major worldwide brands such as Intel, Bank of America, PUR, Nike, Quaker, and Pearls Probiotics by creating animations to promote > 20 new major new product releases.
